data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Many people consider immortal life as torment. However, I am interested in prolonging my lifespan. Extending my lifespan by 10 years might help me gain more experience and enables me to have the opportunity to witness the development of civilization. Moreover, there might be other reasons why people want to extend their lifespan, such as having more time to enjoy life and spend time with families. For example, if a person can extend her life by 10 years, she might well have the chance to meet her descendants which will not be the case if she does not live that long.
data.referenceText: Many people are interested in ways to prolong their lives. Does this interest you as well? Why or why not?
data.referenceTranslate: 许多人对延长寿命的方法感兴趣。你对此感兴趣吗?为什么?
